message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you're willing to negotiate. I'm interested in the product, but $140 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $137.50
